user_query: I want to identify the most popular NFT collections based on volume, sales, floor price, and market cap.

TaskList.description: Fetch NFT collections data across specified networks (Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, and Solana).
Filter fetched collections by popularity based on volume, sales, floor price, and market cap.
Extract relevant details such as names, logos, floor prices, market caps, and number of owners for each collection.
Compile a summary report including all collected data formatted for presentation.
